description:

Tommy, being the pig he is, claims he doesn't really want to fight back because she's a girl. So he leaves her with no choice other than for her to totally annihilate his body and ego. She sucks his dick until it's hard then pins him down and fucks him until he cums in her pussy.
title: Chauvinistic Pig gets Beatdown by muscular babe after date goes bad
